content: end of round round 11 k work rounds 8-11 a total of 3-4-5-6 times 118-134-150-166 sts on needles round 25 work round 8 once more but stop 2 sts before the end of the round transfer the last 2 stitches to a piece of scrap yarn we will call this the body stitch holder from now on turn the piece is worked flat from here row 26 ws p until the last stitch put this stitch on the body stitch holder turn row 27 rs k1 *yo k2tog* to 1 sts before the first marker yo k sm yo k2tog yo k *yo k2tog* to 1 sts before the second marker yo k sm yo k2tog yo k *yo k2tog* to 1 sts before the third marker yo k sm yo k2tog yo k *yo k2tog* to 1 sts before the fourth marker yo k sm yo k2tog yo k *yo k2tog* to the last 2 sts put these on the body stitch holder turn row 28 ws p until the last 2 sts put these sts on the body stitch holder turn row 29 rs k1 *yo k2tog* to 2 sts before the first marker yo k2 sm yo k2 *yo k2tog* to 2 sts before the second marker yo k2 sm yo k2 *yo k2tog* to 2 sts before the third marker yo k2 sm yo k2 *yo k2tog* to 2 sts before the fourth marker yo k2 sm yo k2 *yo k2tog* to the last 2 sts put these on the body stitch holder turn row 30 ws p until the last 2 sts put these sts on the body stitch holder turn row 31 rs k1 *yo k2tog* to 1 sts before the first marker yo k sm yo k2tog yo k *yo k2tog* to 1 sts before the second marker yo k sm yo k2tog yo k *yo k2tog* to 1 sts before the third marker yo k sm yo k2tog yo k *yo k2tog* to 1 sts before the fourth marker yo k sm yo k2tog yo k *yo k2tog* to the last 2 sts put these on the body stitch holder turn row 32 ws p until the last 2 sts put these sts on the body stitch holder turn work row 29-32 a total of 3 times 151-167-183-199 sts on needles divide for sleeves/body row 41 rs k1 *yo k2tog* to first marker rm yo k2tog slip all stitches up to the second marker =38-42-46-50 sts on another piece of scrap yarn rm from now on we will call this arm1 stitch holder cast on 10 new stitches pm cast on 1 more new stitch see tip for underarm stitches k2tog *yo k2tog* to next stitch marker sm slip next 38-42-46-50 sts = up to 2 sts before the fourth stitch marker on another piece of scrap yarn from now
